entries.wrong_chem: It looks like you need to put a beaker of liquid in there...
entries.stabilizer: The stabilizer mixes with the chemicals, removing the poison, but it looks like it will only be temporary...
entries.keycard_success: You have successfully used a keycard on this door.
entries.right_code: You have successfully entered the code for this door.
entries.shock: You feel electricity coursing through your body!
entries.power_off: You have shut off the power.
entries.bad_code: The number that you entered is not a valid code for this door.
entries.hack_success: You have successfully hacked this terminal.
entries.hack_fail: Unable to successfully slice the keypad, you realize that the only way to reset it is to carefully repair what damage you have done.
entries.relock: Security systems at this facility have been cycled and reset.
entries.gas_off: You have shut off the gas leak.
entries.gas_already_off: The gas leak has already been repaired...
entries.electric_trash: You were electrified by the trash heap!
entries.trash_empty: You dig through the trash but find nothing of value...
entries.trash_full: You dig through the trash and find something interesting...
entries.gasmask: Your gasmask diffuses the poison gas and you are able to breathe with no difficulty.
entries.no_entry: An invisible wall keeps you from entering this cave...
